iLogo Development Notes

15 Sep 2013

Overview

iLogo is a Logo turtle game on iPhone. I transplanted it from the course project called sLogo. Fabio and I were in charge of the BackEnd and iLogo serves an opportunity to learn how to code for FrontEnd.
